Detailed Description

Stores source file information for DzStorable objects.

This information can be used by the Asset IO Framework to load some types of assets from their original source file when a normal asset definition can't be found.

void DzLegacySourceInfo::fromString ( const QString &  sourceInfoString  ) 

Set the legacy source info from a string.

Normally this method shouldn't be used - it is provided so the Asset IO framework can use it.

QString DzLegacySourceInfo::getFilePath (  )  const
Returns:
The path to the original source file for a legacy item. The path is specified relative to a mapped content directory.
QString DzLegacySourceInfo::getLocatorID ( int  i  )  const
Returns:
The locator ID at index i in the list of IDs.
See also:
getLocatorIDs
QStringList DzLegacySourceInfo::getLocatorIDs (  )  const

Get the list of locator IDs for a legacy item.

Locator IDs are string IDs that can be used to locate a relevant portion of a source file (i.e. figure name, morph name, geometry group name, etc.). For example, for a morph that came from a CR2 file, the locator IDs would be the name of a node, and the name of the morph. This info can be used to parse the relevant parts of the CR2 file.

Returns:
A list of locator ID strings.
int DzLegacySourceInfo::getNumLocatorIDs (  )  const
Returns:
The number of locator IDs for a legacy item.
See also:
getLocatorIDs
DzFileIOSettings & DzLegacySourceInfo::getSettings (  )  const

void DzLegacySourceInfo::setFilePath ( const QString &  filePath  ) 

Sets the path for the original source file for a legacy item. The path should be specified relative to a mapped content directory.

Parameters:
filePath A file path specified relative to a mapped content directory.
void DzLegacySourceInfo::setFilePathFromAbsolutePath ( const QString &  absolutePath  ) 

Sets the path for the original source file for a legacy item.

The given path will be converted into a path relative to a mapped content directory. If the file path is not in mapped directory, it will be truncated relative to a "Runtime" directory. If it still cannot be converted, the absolute file path is left absolute.

Parameters:
absolutePath An absolute file path that will be converted to be relative to a mapped content directory.
void DzLegacySourceInfo::setLocatorIDs ( const QStringList &  locatorIDs  ) 

Sets the list of locator IDs for a legacy item.

Locator IDs are string IDs that can be used to locate a relevant portion of a source file (i.e. figure name, morph name, geometry group name, etc.). For example, for a morph that came from a CR2 file, the locator IDs would be the name of a node, and the name of the morph. This info can be used to parse the relevant parts of the CR2 file.

Parameters:
locatorIDs A list of strings to set as the locator IDs.
See also:
getLocatorIDs

Normally this method shouldn't be used - it is provided so the Asset IO framework can use it.
